name: Planet of the Beast
description:
FPS and dungeon crawler experimental hybrid with elevation movement and bullet hell combat. Utilize tactics, discover secrets, and navigate your way through the treacherous world of Karmine IV in search of the man who killed your father.

Credits:

Programming and 3D Art by  Ruben Tipparach

2D Art  by Suule

Music by Twitchwhalez

Sound FX by Fokai

Additional 2D Art by InkeFaux

Patch 1 Coming Soon after the Jam Voting:

- An extra level left on the cutting room floor.

- Progression of main plot.

- Angle snapping for mouse look mode (so you don't have to rotate camera manually).

- Itchy trigger finger? Mouse fire restriction removed.

- Better balancing for enemies/health/stats/bullets.

- 3 more guns.

- Persist game saves.
